name: Salarycalculator
body:
### Welcome to VOPunjab's VO Salary Calculator.
The VO salary Calculator Salary Calculator calculates the VO's salary with just one click by automatically applying the increments, current DA as approved/ordered/issued by Govt., DACP, and gives you split up salary detail.

### VOPunjab Notice Board Updates
VO Salary Calculator also brings you the latest info about dept., Association, University, Posts etc.

### Authors and Contributors
VO Salary Calculator is designed and created by Dr Vipin Brar.

### Support or Contact
For any difficulties, troubleshoot, queries, feedback, mail us at contact@DrVipin.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
